key_risks: Regulatory Risks: Dependence on FDA and international regulatory approvals for TP-03 and other pipeline candidates.
Market Competition: High competition in ophthalmology and dermatology sectors.
Financial Sustainability: Reliance on external funding as a clinical-stage company.
Dependence on TP-03: Near-term success heavily tied to TP-03's commercialization.
Manufacturing Dependencies: Reliance on third-party manufacturers for quality control and scalability.
social_issues: Ethical Commitment: Emphasis on patient-centric values and advancing science through education and research.
